name: Prevent Sleep
description: Prevent the system from entering sleep mode when there are active streams. Support is limited to servers running Windows.

versions.changelog: * Support for Jellyfin 10.9. Note that this version is **not** compatible with Jellyfin 10.8 or older.
* Latest version supporting Jellyfin 10.8. Note that this version is **not** compatible with Jellyfin 10.9 or newer.
